name: Wrestler Dedication
prereq: Trained In Unarmed Attacks, And Unarmored Defense; Trained In Athletics
summary: Your training in the wrestling arts has made you particularly adept at moving, striking, and grappling while unencumbered.
description:
Your training in the wrestling arts has made you particularly adept at moving, striking, and grappling while unencumbered. You become an expert in Athletics and gain the Titan Wrestler skill feat.
